troubleshooting.title: Remote Not Turning On
troubleshooting.shortdesc: If your remote isn't turning on, follow these instructions to restore it.

condition.p: The remote will not turn on.

cause.p: The remote does not have any batteries in it.
The remote does not have any batteries in it.

step.cmd: Remove the battery cover from the remote by pressing the black button located on the back of the remote.
Slide the battery cover off of the remote.
Check if there are any batteries. If there aren't any batteries, place AA batteries in the remote.
